snippet: Mr. Davidson was a hulking defensive end who starred for the Oakland Raiders in the 1960s before becoming a television pitch man.
abstract: Ben Davidson, the hulking defensive end who starred for the Oakland Raiders in the 1960s before becoming a television pitchman, died at age 72.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Davidson was a hulking defensive end who starred for the Oakland Raiders in the 1960s before becoming a television pitch man.

headline.seo: Ben Davidson, Defensive End, Dies at 72
headline.main: Ben Davidson, Defensive End for Renegade Raiders, Dies at 72
headline.print_headline: Ben Davidson, Renegade And Pitchman, Dies at 72
